About Me

Bimo Tyasono is a (Central) Banker. Because of the 2020 pandemic, Bimo started a podcast with his friend on Spotify named Podcast FnB: Podcast Fira dan Bimo. Bimo is also open to connect with new friends and explore new opportunity.

Since 2018, Bimo tried to consistently log his movies and books activity. Bimo is also open to any books and movies/series recommendation.

You can also read my general blog at tentangbimo, and sometimes I upload videos to my youtube channel

Stay healthy, and stay safe!
